samples.ui
Class List

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.List

public class List
extends Component

This class implements a popup menu. When popped "up", displays entire menu of options and user may scroll up and down to select a new option. When popped "down", shows only a single line w/ the current selected value. Pops "up" and "down" on select/fire events.

Method Detail

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(int action,
                          int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key press action.

Overrides:
keyPressed in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The Choice class handles actions of type Canvas.FIRE and notifies registered event listeners of an Event of type Event.ITEM_SELECTED or Event.ITEM_DESELECTED as the state is toggled.
key - The key pressed.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.

calcPopupPlacement

protected void calcPopupPlacement()
Calculate placement for the popup menu, trying to place its upper-left corner at the List widget's x,y location, but moving it up/left as necessary to keep it from extending off the bottom/right edges of the screen.

paint

Paint this instance, either in its popped-up state (with full menu of options visible) or popped "down", displaying only the current selection.
